Set Time and Date Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Place a time stamp control on the front panel and click the Time/Date Browse button to display this dialog box. If the button is not visible, right-click the time stamp control and select Visible Items»Time/Date Browse Button from the shortcut menu. When you display this dialog box, it displays the current time and date retrieved from the computer settings. You also can right-click the time stamp control and select Data Operations»Set Time and Date from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to configure the time and date for the time stamp control and constant.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Time—Text box where you specify the time.
  • Month—Pull-down menu where you specify the month.
  • Year—Ring control where you specify the year by clicking the increment or decrement buttons.
  • Date—Calendar where you select the day.
  • Set Time to Now—Sets the time and date value to the current time and date.
